splashText1: Does your child no longer play their old toys and want new ones? Or your child is now grown up and you want to profit from their old toys?
splashText2: Upload a photo of the toys you don't want anymore and create an ad!
splashText3: You can exchange toys by talking to and agreeing with the owners of other toy ads!
passwordError: Oops! Your passwords should be longer than 6 characters!
registerText: If you didn't register yet click here to register!
name: Name
